Package net.silthus.schat.chatter

package net.silthus.schat.chatter
Contains the classes and API for Chatters.
  • Class
    Description
    Chatter
    The chatter is a message target that can be used to send and receive messages.
    Chatter.Builder
    The builder of a Chatter.
    Chatter.MessageHandler
    The message handler is used to dispatch raw rendered messages to the chatter.
    Chatter.PermissionHandler
    The permission handler used by a chatter to validate a permission node.
    ChatterFactory
    Used to create new instances of a chatter based on the type of the implementing platform.
    ChatterPrototype
    Internal utility for configuring the prototype of chatters.
    ChatterRepository
